attributes.action: DISSOLVE PARILAMENT! TAKE PETITION TO THE QUEEN
attributes.background: As the government cannot decide or put the people of the UK first, we are calling to the Queen to help the UK by dissolving parliament.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Under the Fixed Terms Parliament Act 2011 the Queen cannot dissolve Parliament.
You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237487
